programme.title: Nautanki Saala
programme.desc: Ram Parmar, a theatre artist, saves Mandar Lele whom he finds attempting suicide due to his breakup with girlfriend Nandini. As Ram is a good-hearted person, he gives Mandar a role in his theatre play. Later, he tries to unite Mandar with Nandini and during this time, he lies to his girlfriend and friend. Ram eventually falls for Nandini and the two start dating but due to the feeling of guilt, Ram leaves Nandini. When his girlfriend and Mandar come to know about him and Nandini, they leave him and go. Ram, who goes into depression, visits a psychiatrist who suggests that he should apologise to all three of them. Mandar comes back and unites Ram with Nandini. (Film - Rom-Com)

programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, nominated for several prestigious awards, follows Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) and blacksmith Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) in the 17th century in the Caribbean Sea as they endeavour to liberate the abducted Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) from the menacing and supernaturally cursed pirate crew of the Black Pearl who, due to a set of reasons, become undead skeletons at night. Will has personal reasons for assisting Jack in his mission to rescue Elizabeth, the daughter of Port Royal's Governor. The two launch a massive struggle to undo the curse. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Johnny Depp reprises his iconic role as the constantly flinching, smirking and cunning pirate, Captain Jack Sparrow, in the fourth installation of the Pirates of the Caribbean series, which is directed by Rob Marshall. Jack and Captain Barbossa set out on a journey to find the legendary fountain of youth. But he must face the fearsome pirate Blackbeard and his enigmatic daughter Angelica, who are also in search of the fountain. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: The highly acclaimed director Kenneth Branagh resurrects the age-old fairy tale of a damsel in distress and her Prince Charming with this fantasy flick that has Lily James donning the role of the eponymous 'Cinderella'. Packed with stars like Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden, Sophie McShera, Holliday Grainger and Helena Bonham Carter and sprinkled with entertaining and dramatic scenes, the film chronicles the spellbinding journey of the princess. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Love In The Forecast
programme.desc: (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a street urchin, discovers a magical lamp and learns about a Genie trapped inside it. When the Genie bestows upon him three wishes, he uses them to win the heart of Jasmine, his lady-love, and protect her from Jafar, a cunning vizier. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: Ram Parmar, a theatre artist, saves Mandar Lele whom he finds attempting suicide due to his breakup with girlfriend Nandini. As Ram is a good-hearted person, he gives Mandar a role in his theatre play. Later, he tries to unite Mandar with Nandini and during this time, he lies to his girlfriend and friend. Ram eventually falls for Nandini and the two start dating but due to the feeling of guilt, Ram leaves Nandini. When his girlfriend and Mandar come to know about him and Nandini, they leave him and go. Ram, who goes into depression, visits a psychiatrist who suggests that he should apologise to all three of them. Mandar comes back and unites Ram with Nandini. (Film - Rom-Com)

With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

Along with his friend, Chug, a fuel truck, Dusty practises flying manoeuvres, in order to qualify for the Wings Across the World race. A night before the qualifiers, Dusty asks Skipper, an old navy war plane, for assistance. Skipper refuses to help Dusty. The next day at the race, Dusty is laughed upon by the audience but manages to wow them with his smooth flying. He just manages to qualify for the main race. It is then that Skipper asks Dusty the reason he wants to participate in the race and satisfied with his answer, he decides to help Dusty. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Robin Monroe's vacation with her boyfriend turns into a nightmare when she finds herself stranded on a deserted island with a pilot whom she dislikes. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: The Guardians are hired by the Sovereign, an alien race, to retrieve their batteries, but Rocket ends up stealing them. In the chase that ensues, they're rescued by Peter's father, and he sets out to discover his parentage, only to reunite with his friends to save the galaxy once again. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: Dan Cheung, an infamous thief, is imprisoned after he miscalculates a heist. When he is released five years later, Dan plans another heist with his old partner and a new recruit. However, Pierre, a French detective, is hot on his trail and tries to recruit Dan's ex-fiance to help bring him to justice. (Film - Action)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita (Joely Richardson) and computer game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs puppies are kidnapped by Anitas boss Cruella De Vil (Glenn Close), who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the fur coat she has set her heart on. Enlisting the help of the other animals, Pongo and Perdita set out to find and rescue the pups from their fearsome captors. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is offered the chance to cut short his prison tenure by going on a secret mission for the US government deep into the jungles of Vietnam and locating American POWs. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A decade after his father's death in the Battle of the Breach, Jake Pentecost forfeits his Jaeger training and makes a living off the black market. But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: After his son, Nemo, gets abducted in the Great Barrier Reef and is despatched to a fish tank in a dentist's office in Sydney, Marlin, a meek clownfish, embarks on a journey to bring him home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Rule Of Three
programme.desc: A father repeatedly visits the motel room where his daughter was last seen before her abduction in the hope of solving the mystery and ultimately finding her. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: Billie and Pete, a married couple, take a family skiing vacation to Austria. However, after having a near-death experience, they are forced to confront their relationship and feelings for each other. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an inventor, leads an army of ants against a group of grasshoppers who steal their food every year. He also enlists a troop of circus bugs to help him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Oz The Great And Powerful
programme.desc: Oscar Diggs, a magician, works in a travelling circus in Kansas. Known to have a reputation of being a womaniser, Oscar falls in love with the circus strongman's wife. Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: To avoid surrendering their apron and going home, the remaining contestants must replicate the tarte Tatin in 60 minutes. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Queen Of The South
programme.desc: While Javier and Boaz are forced to take care of a personal problem, Teresa Mendoza gets involved in an acrimonious dispute. (TV Show - Crime)

As everyone in Los Angeles celebrates Halloween, the police and first responders are on high alert. Meanwhile, Buck returns to Station 118 and is coldly received by his workmates, especially Eddie. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria. They receive a sobering visit. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Oz The Great And Powerful
programme.desc: Oscar Diggs, a magician, works in a travelling circus in Kansas. Known to have a reputation of being a womaniser, Oscar falls in love with the circus strongman's wife. Fearing that he may be caught, he escapes in a hot air balloon. A strong tornado sweeps his balloon to the Land of Oz where he meets Theodora, a naive witch. Theodora assumes that he is a wizard hired to kill her competitor, the Wicked Witch. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: Alex unwillingly returns to his ancestral house along with Grace and they get married. After the ceremony, Grace is informed by her new family about a tradition they follow where they all play a game with the new member. Eager to prove herself, she cheerfully agrees, but the innocent game soon turns bloody, revealing the sick history of the family. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Alice, now 19 years old, follows a rabbit in a blue coat to a magical wonderland from her dreams where she is reunited with her friends who make her realise her true destiny. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Thing About Harry
programme.desc: Sam, a young gay man, is forced to share a ride with his high school enemy, Harry. However, things soon change between them when Sam learns that Harry is pansexual. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A few Jewish soldiers are on an undercover mission to bring down the Nazi government and put an end to the war. Meanwhile, a woman wants to avenge the death of her family from a German officer. (Film - War)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.desc: After his son, Nemo, gets abducted in the Great Barrier Reef and is despatched to a fish tank in a dentist's office in Sydney, Marlin, a meek clownfish, embarks on a journey to bring him home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Circus performer Holt Farrier returns home after the First World War and is tasked with caring for a newborn elephant with oversized ears, Dumbo. The circus is undergoing a financial crisis but when it is discovered that Dumbo can fly, vultures close in under the pretext of making him an icon. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: Belle, a beautiful young woman, agrees to live with the Beast in exchange for the return of her abducted father. Soon, Belle discovers that her hideous captor is actually an enchanted prince. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Spies In Disguise
programme.desc: Lance Sterling, a secret agent, finds himself transformed into a pigeon. He then sets out with his associate Walter to stop a villain who is using Sterling's disguise to carry out a dangerous plan. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Apna Bana Ke Dekho
programme.desc: Jankiraman alias Johny is a hoodlum, known to the local police, has been arrested several times, and lives a poor lifestyle in a city in South India along with his widowed mom. His mother and father had a love marriage, but he died a violent death. She kept her Mangalsutra around his photo frame. Once she talked to a parrot astrologer, who predicted great things in Janikiraman's life, as he will soon be associating with rich people, as well as getting married to a very wealthy girl... (Drama)

programme.title: Karishma Kudrat Ka
programme.desc: Vijay is a simple-minded widower who lives in a small rural town in India with his unmarried sister, Radha; his son; and his widowed mom. Radha is soon to be married to Sub-Inspector Raj. One day Vijay witnesses a killing of a young child by notorious bandit Bhagad Singh, and chides him. As a result, Bhagad and his gang severely beat him up, and only spare his life after Vijay's mom begs them to forgive him. But Lala Dayaluram hires Bhagad to ensure that Vijay and his family leave the town, and when they refuse Vijay is abducted, severely beaten and left for dead. An escaped convict and killer named Karan, who happens to be Vijay's exact look-alike, sees the unconscious Vijay, and decides to assume his identity, stabs him, and throws him to his death from atop a cliff. Karan then goes to live with his family. The motive for Karan to live here is merely to hide under Vijay's name until the police give up their manhunt for him. No one really notices the change in Vijay. Karan starts to frequent the nearby brothel run by Kammobai, and soon realizes that he can make a lot of money by selling young women to her. His first target that he intends to lure to Kammobai is none other than Radha, Vijay's sister. This is just one of the destructive methods he intends to employ in his new identity and there is no one who can dare to suspect nor stop him. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Yaraana
programme.desc: Lalita (Madhuri Dixit) is married under duress from her maternal uncle, Madhi (Tej Sapru) to a cruel and possessive man, JB (Raj Babbar). (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Teri Kasam
programme.desc: A spoiled rich girl falls for a poor aspiring musician. But after they marry, their egos and respective stubbornness cause them to drift apart. (Romance)

programme.title: Shaapit
programme.desc: The story of a girl who is trapped in a generational curse, which does not allow her love & marriage and her lover who vows to conquer this curse. (Horror)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan and Sharad Kapoor are the leaders of the two rival gangs. Aishwarya Rai is Shah Rukh Khan's twin sister. Shah Rukh is in love with Priya Gill. Chandrachur Singh is Sharad Kapoor's younger brother who studies in a catering college in Bombay. He comes to Goa to visit his brother and plans to go back and start a restaurant there. He sees Aishwarya and falls in love with her. Chandrachur gives up the idea of going back to Bombay and opens a bakery in Goa. When Shah Rukh comes to know about the romance between Aishwarya and Chandrachur, the fight between the gang turns more violent. How the conflict is resolved is the rest of the story. Written by gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Prem Deewane
programme.desc: Radha (Pooja Bhatt) and Manohar (Vivek Mushran) love each other and want to get married, but Radha's dad (Ashok Saraf) does not approve of their marriage as Manohar comes from a poor family. He instructs Radha not to leave the house, but Radha finds a way to escape and goes to Manohar's house. Anticipating more obstacles, they run away, guided by Radha's uncle Natwarlal(Prem Chopra). Natwarlal convinces them that they must kidnap a wealthy person and demand a big ransom and take the money to appease Radha's dad. It is then they start to realize that their uncle has some other devious plans for them. (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Dhokha
programme.desc: Post-September 11, 2001, Zaid Ahmed Khan lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and resides in an apartment at Shanti Kutir, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, and works as an Assistant Commissioner of Police. One day terrorists strike at a club, killing 20 people, & critically injuring several others. The Police are put on alert, and Zaid is summoned to Police Headquarters to identify a body. To his shock the body turns out to be that of Sarha, his wife - who was not a victim but was a suicide-bomber. While trying to put his life together, Zaid comes across evidence that Sarha may have had an hand in the killings, and thus intrigued he decides to travel to Nasik to find out what really happened, whether his devout Islamic wife was really a terrorist or the victim of a deep-rooted conspiracy. (Drama,Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Mast
programme.desc: Mast is a 1999 Bollywood musical film by Indian director Ram Gopal Verma. This was the debut film for Aftab Shivdasani as a lead actor. Till then, he was recognized as a child actor. Kittu (Aftab Shivdasani) is an arts student in Pune and is madly in love with actress and film star Malika (Urmila Matondkar). He has posters up on his wall and goes to all of her movies, and even fantasizes that she is there with him when he is watching these items. His father concerned with his son's declining exam scores, confronts Kittu on his obsession and tears down the posters. To Kittu, this is almost as bad as murder and decides to move out and away to Mumbai, where the star, herself, lives. (Fantasy,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Cover Story
programme.desc: A retired judge is brutally shot and with his murderer still at large, his visually impaired neighbor becomes a prime suspect. (Thriller,Action,Family)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Pehchaan
programme.desc: A convict by the name of Yogi Shankar is accused of sexual molestation in court. The Judge Jagdish Verma who is responsible for passing Jogi's sentence is well aware of Jogi's behavior as he was once Jogi's defense advocate. With no hesitation Jagdish Verma grant a seven years period of rigorous punishment to Jogi despite his pleadings. The Judge family consists of his wife Urmilla, sons Kunal and Karan Verma; on completion of his seven years sentence Jogi is released from jail and abducts Urmilla, finds out that she is pregnant, ensures that she gives birth to a baby girl Tina and then kills her. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: TBA
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme. (Entertainment)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Shiva Shakti
programme.desc: Shiva travels to the city to earn money for his sister Kusum's marriage. He meets Shakti and they become friends. When Kusum gets pregnant with Shakti's child, Shiva vows to murder him. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Ghatak: Lethal
programme.desc: A small town in Bombay is brutally subdued by a notorious gangster named Katya and his brothers. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Arundhati
programme.desc: Kshetram is a 2011 romantic action Telugu movie produced by G. Govinda Raju on Sri Balaji Movie Makers banner, directed by T Venugopal. Starring Jagapati Babu, Priyamani, Kick Shaam in the lead roles and music composed by Koti. (Romance,Thriller,Drama)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev are two small-time crooks. One day they accidentally killed a man named Mohan Tripathi. With a good and pleasant mind they find out the address of the decreased and pays a visit to his village. Only to see the young man's family eagerly waiting for his return from abroad, seeing the family's plight they decides to lie about the young man and told the family that he is alive but was delayed because of some urgent work. Days and months passed and Mohan did not showed up towards his family and both young men continues to lie to them. The question remain what will be the outcome of Ajay and Dev when the family learns that there son is no longer alive and that both are his killers? (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Tum Bin
programme.desc: Shekhar, a businessman, accidentally kills his associate Amar, and ridden with guilt, decides to watch over Amar's company and take care of his family and friends. However, he falls in love with Amar's fiancé Piya - who is to marry tycoon Abhi Gyan to save the company (Romance,Drama)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Kismat
programme.desc:
A policeman’s son begins to work with criminals. Can his life be turned around?
Ajay (Govinda) is adopted and brought up by ACP Anand (Suresh Oberoi) and his biological mother Geeta (Rakhee), though the parents believe he is actually Anand’s child. Fate intervenes when Ajay begins to work with his real father, Rajan (Kabir Bedi).

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Barsaat
programme.desc: Arav (Bobby Deol) is an ambitious young Indian whose dream is to design cars. He travels to the United States seeking greener pastures, where he meets the beautiful Anna (Bipasha Basu). Anna instantly goes head over heels for Arav, but Arav remains focused on his career. Over time, he mellows and the two fall in love. Moreover, Arav's ambitions go on the upswing as the chairman of the BMW company in the U.S. (Shakti Kapoor) gives him a job as a designer. Coincidentally, the BMW chairman happens to be Anna's grandfather, and he announces the impending nuptials of Arav and Anna.

programme.title: Daanveer
programme.desc: After the passing away of his widower and advocate dad, Vijay Srivastav takes it upon himself to raise his younger siblings, Vishal and Sudha. Years later, while Vishal is studying I.A.S., Sudha is of marriageable age, while Vijay makes a living driving an auto-rickshaw. He arranges Sudha's marriage with Anil, the only son of Ramprasad and Shanti, with a dowry of over 3 Lakh Rupees. The marriage takes place and Sudha re-locates to live with her in-laws. A few months later Vijay is informed that Sudha is expecting and brings her home. Shortly thereafter his world will be turned upside down when he finds out that Anil is getting married and had actually driven Sudha out as he suspected her of having an affair with another man. While Vijay attempts to deal with this situation, he does not know that Vishal has fallen in love with Jyoti, who is the daughter of Kalyan Singh - a man who is obsessed with avenging the death of his father at the hands of Vijay's dad, while Kalyan's son, Bheema, is all set to get married to Vijay's girlfriend, Chitra. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju comes to Mumbai in search of a job and becomes a peon for a big firm. He soon discovers that certain people are scheming to make the company go bankrupt. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Insaniyat
programme.desc: A Police officer seeks the help of two gangsters to combat terrorism. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
programme.desc: Karan Khanna is an orphan and a captain in the Rajputana Armed Forces. He's madly in love with beautiful model Nisha, with whom he plans to tie the knot during his next leave. On the way to... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Pardesi Babu 1998 (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Agnivarsha
programme.desc: The film is Based on an incident from the Mahabharata and also made as a play on a Girish Karnad titled Fire in the Rain. The film features Amitabh Bachchan in a cameo appearance as Lord Indra. Jackie Shroff plays the main lead in the film as Puravasu the head priest, Raveena playing the role of his unfaithful wife in love with Yavakri. Nagarjuna played Yavakri the priest's jealous rival and Prabhudeva as a demon who kills Yavakri. While Milind Soman plays the younger brother of Jackie Shroff as Aravasu, the female lead opposite Milind is played by Sonali Kulkarni. (Drama,Fantasy)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
programme.desc: Honest truck driver Balwant watch helplessly as the owners of the trucking company he works for mauled his brother, Jaswant to death. When he lodges a complaint with the police the inspector instead arrest him for this crime; the trucking company owners then burn his house killing his pregnant wife Sumati. Years later Balwant who now calls himself Karamvir operates a court called 'Teesri Adalat' by sentencing wrong-doers to death in a judge and executer style. However he is unaware that Sumati is still alive and has given birth to twins Rajesh and Mahesh; while Mahesh was separated at birth and grows up with Inspector Ram Avtar and his wife - Rajesh is taking care of his mother as she loses her mental balance in the trauma. Rajesh and Mahesh do get to unite as the girls they are in love with are link to each other. After a few misjudgments of situations at hand Rajesh and Mahesh decides that they will bring Teesri Adalat to the court of law - at any cost. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Ranbhoomi
programme.desc: Village born, simple-minded and honest, Bholanath comes to the big city with five hundred rupees, which he decides to keep with a prostitute, as he feels that his money will be a lot safer with her, than with him. He then befriends a dreaded gangster, Roopa, and goes to live and keep house for him. In an attempt to end hostilities between Roopa and rival gangster, Chandan Singh, he then offers himself as a hostage. But will the dreaded Roopa compromise to save Bholanath? And if so, will Chandan let Bhola live? (Action)

programme.desc: Vishwanath and Jaikishan are two thieves and good friends. When they try to lead an honest life for the sake of their women, Pukhraj turns them against each other and the two become sworn enemies.

programme.desc: Laxman Krishna, a criminal lawyer, manages to win all his cases. All the wrong-doers consider him as their God. But things change when he is assigned to defend the convicts who have murdered a girl. (Crime)

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
programme.desc: Intrepid British archaeologist Lara Croft has made perhaps the most important archaeological discovery in history: an orb that leads to the mythical Pandora's Box. Unfortunately, the orb falls into the hands of Jonathan Reiss, an evil scientist who deals in killer viruses and hopes to sell the secrets of the box as the ultimate weapon. (Action,Adventure,Fantasy,Thriller)

programme.title: Gully Boy
programme.desc: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai. (Drama,Music)

programme.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
programme.desc: A social movie about escalating electric bills. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Hogi Pyar Ki Jeet
programme.desc: Surjit finds out that his sister is in love with Manjit Singh . Surjit goes to Thakurs house in order to get Manjit to marry his sister. The Thakur humiliates him; making him, a vegetarian, eat dog food and beg on his knees. Surjit does so and is told to go home and make wedding preparations. The next day, Thakur visits Surjit and kills him and his wife in broad daylight. Surjits last dying wish is that his two sons Raju and Kishan must get married to Thakur's and his brother's two daughters Megha and Preeti and they must have the Thakur come begging to their doorstep for this marriage alliance. Surjits sister agrees to this and accordingly brings up the two children. Unfortunately Raju goes missing leaving her alone to bring up Kishan. Years later they are reunited when Raju returns home and they join together to fulfill Surjits last wish. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Holiday: A Soldier Is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: A soldier on vacation finds himself hunting down a terrorist. A military officer attempts to hunt down a terrorist, destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command. (Thriller,Action,Romance)

programme.title: Chennai Vs China
programme.desc: The film depicts the fictional life of Bodhidharma (Suriya), a master of martial arts and medical remedies, who is depicted in the film as the son of a great Tamil king of the Pallava Dynasty. He is sent to China by his guru, who requests him to stop the spread of a pandemic disease existing there from spreading to India. Initially the people in China treated him as an inferior but later when he cures a little girl from the deadly disease and fights against some people who ill treated villagers there, the people of China began to respect and worship him. He begins to teach them how to cure many diseases, the skills of hypnotism and the physical training of the Shaolin monks that led to the creation of Shaolinquan. However after few years, when he expresses his desire to return to India, the villagers plot to poison him and bury him near the temple, believing that their place would be disease free if he is buried there. (Action,Sci-Fi,Thriller)

programme.title: Khiladi 786
programme.desc: The 8th installment in the Khiladi series. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: A year after the first movie, the four friends are enjoying their lives to the fullest, get in trouble once again with Bholi, who is released from prison earlier than expected and is broke. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: FryDay
programme.desc: FryDay is a Hindi movie starring Govinda in a prominent role. The cast also includes Sanjay Mishra, Rajesh Sharma, Varun Sharma and Brijendra Kala. It is a comedy directed by Abhishek Dogra. (Comedy)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: After returning from a wedding reception, a couple staying in an isolated vacation house receive a knock on the door in the mid-hours of the night. What ensues is a violent invasion by three strangers, their faces hidden behind masks. The couple find themselves in a violent struggle, in which they go beyond what either of them thought capable in order to survive. (Thriller,Horror,Mystery)

programme.title: Sonchiriya
programme.desc: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands. (Crime,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Ishqedarriyaan
programme.desc: A love triangle between a successful businessman, a schoolteacher and a musician (Romance)

programme.title: Parmanu
programme.desc: A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran lead by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's tenure. (Drama,Action,History)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: 12-year-old Dre Parker could have been the most popular kid in Detroit, but his mother's latest career move has landed him in China. Dre immediately falls for his classmate Mei Ying but the cultural differences make such a friendship impossible. Even worse, Dre's feelings make him an enemy of the class bully, Cheng. With no friends in a strange land, Dre has nowhere to turn but maintenance man Mr. Han, who is a kung fu master. As Han teaches Dre that kung fu is not about punches and parries, but maturity and calm, Dre realizes that facing down the bullies will be the fight of his life. (Action,Adventure,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Satyendra aka Sattu (Rajkummar Rao) and Aarti (Kriti Kharbanda) meet for a proposed arranged marriage and fall in love in the process. On the night of their marriage, an unexpected turn of events turns their world upside down. Set in the backdrop of India's civil services, Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana explores the challenges that Satyendra and Aarti face as a middle-class couple in India. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Encounter Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mahesh Babu) is an orphan who is adopted by a sincere police officer (Rajendra Prasad). But he is forced to leave and become a cop on his own. Shankar is a powerful police officer who uses unconventional methods to bring criminals to justice. He is posted to a village where Damodhar (Sonusood) is building a power plant, which is fiercely opposed by the locals. Shankar finds a personal connection after going to the village. Rest of the story is all about how Shankar sets everything right. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: Sun Wukong, (The Monkey King) is a monkey born from a heavenly stone who acquires supernatural powers. After rebelling against heaven and being imprisoned under a mountain for 500 years, he later accompanies the monk Xuanzang on a journey to India. Thus, according to legend, Buddhism is brought to ancient China. This much beloved story, is as much a part of Asian culture as The Iliad and The Odyssey or The Wizard of Oz are to the West. This first installment in a trilogy of live action 3-D movies is actually a prequel to The Journey To The West, the much told story of the Monkey King's adventures on the road to India. (Action,Adventure,Family)
